ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship is a type of . A Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship is the association between a
or a
and the
that is the occurrence of that planar shape. If the type of the shape representation of the assembly is different from the type of the shape representation of the part, the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship allows a processor to create a shape rep of the assembly type and establish an equivalency relationship between that shape representation and the part shape representation. If the shape representation of the assembly is of the same type as the part shape representation, the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship shall reference the same shape representation as both the part_shape and the component_shape. That instance shall be a complex instance of the part shape and of the component shape.
